subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Scurrying to revive a football conference dwindling in programs and in relevancy, the Big East said it was considering moving to a model that consisted of 12 football-playing universities.
snippet: Scurrying to revive a football conference dwindling in programs and in relevancy, the Big East said it was considering moving to a model that consisted of 12 football-playing universities.
